Looked exactly like the pictures. Fit is good. The zip feels a bit cheap but goes with the aesthetics. It has thick layers for pocket's edge and thin layers in other parts. This definitely makes it light weight and feels durable at the same time.

Honestly pretty comfy and kinda thick in material. They aren’t built for warmth but I wouldn’t wear them in the summer either. Nevertheless, it has decent pocket sizes to choose from and they feel good.

Theses pants are WAY better quality than the many joggers i've bought off of Amazon. I like how thick the material is. They just feel way higher quality. Wore them to a Rave, i was comfortable the whole time. Now to see how long they stand up to the test of time.
These pants fit me perfectly and the fabric is super soft! My new favorite pants.

They aren't they're sweatpants material.

Thin and impractical weird pockets and they faded quickly just get some rip stop tactical pants instead they last much longer for a little more money.

Alright yall these pants right here are what we all need. From the techware enthusiasts to people who just really like pockets these are the go to pants.  Pros: 13 pockets (some of them are small but now you have options) Nice material (not the usual polyester which is also nice but this cloth is a bit better)  Cons: little short in length but can easily be covered for with high socks Material is a lint magnet so have a lint roller nearby

评论概述: A lot better than I expected!
评论详情: I was unsure when I bought these at first but after I received them, I'm fan! They are pretty durable as other reviewers stated and well-made. They are a little baggy as noted in the description and are on the bigger side in terms of waist fitment. They are comfortable and allow for great range of motion. I got these as a top layer for motorcycling as I wear CE level AA leggings (with armor) for riding in the city and the extra pockets are bonus for carrying and accessing stuff. Also, there are two standard back pockets in case anyone is wondering.  I normally wear a size medium and the small fit great with room to spare so size down when purchasing.

I really like these pants-they’re comfortable, and they have a LOT of pockets. I only wish they had belt loops-they’re waist tie pants. There always exists the possibility that the waist rope could break;and, without belt loops, if that happens, they’re useless.
i like em but they aren't gonna last long.  one of the pocket flaps is already falling off.

Why is it becoming a thing to not have a zipper at the groin? I feel like that’s common sense. It makes it easier to go to the bathroom. Don’t get me wrong, I like the pants, but no zipper means 3 stars for me.
Seems nice so far. Will see how they fit after washing and drying.
I initially bought a large to fit my 30w x 30l pant size but turns out I need a small. Quality is surprisingly good. Feels like I can squat without worrying of the seams bursting.
Me gusta
Very comfortable and durable, fits quite snug and is lighter than expected.
Good, durable material. This is for the urban dwellers out there 👍

Looks crazy slick, is durably built with quality materials/stitching and fits perfectly. I loved them so much I have purchased both color variations and plan to get at least one more pair in each of said colors.
This pant has stood up to Alot of tough wear. Washes great too. Only problem is waiting for the pant. There were some delays.

I usually wear size large in pants. I was hesitant about the sizing at first. I went with the large and these fit well although a tad bit baggy. I kind of like it so it’s no big deal and it’s super comfy. I do like the drawstring and TONS of pockets. One day if I want it a little slightly fitted I’ll probably get it tailored to my body types so it’s all good in regards to the fit.

Bought these for my 11 yr old son. True to size and fits perfectly! He loves them.... like can't get him out of them! As soon as they are washed they are right back on him. Material is great and comfortable, and roomy. He has received a lot of compliments on them, even from strangers 😆
A gift for my grandson. He loves it.

I grabbed these pants for my son( as he purchased the hoodie) He is usually a size 32-33’ waist but the XL fit him perfectly. The pants are made well, great mid weight fabric, and there are a zillion pockets. He, nor I, couldn’t be happier.
